column8: at the Immanuel Lutheran Church in Fairmont. Burial will be held at 5:00 p.m. Tuesday afternoon
column9: at the Lakeside Cemetery in Fairmont with full military honors by the Lee C. Prentice American Legion Post #36 and the Martin County Veterans of Foreign Wars Post #122. Visitation will be 4:00 p.m. to 7:00 p.m Monday
column12: at the Lakeview Funeral Home in Fairmont and will continue one hour prior to the time of service.
